content:
You feel a tingle run up your spine and turn, only to see a shadowy figure duck into a side passageway and vanish some meters away. You call out to them, but they do not emerge. However, when you approach the passageway, you can see them lurking at the far end. As soon as they see you, they slip around a distant corner.

It seems that the figure wants you to follow them again.

Clear the shadow with   to attempt to follow the furtive figure again.
